urces.I have come to belive that not all mentally ill people are really sic=

ome attached to the livving.I also belive that by using franks box its poss=
ible to remove and cure the livving from these unwantted energys that plagu=

ome of the voices that the mentally ill exsperiance actually have awareness=
 outside of their victims knowledge,space and time.I have seen these voices=
 destroy many lives that were cut short by medicines that were uneffective =
and offten worse then
 the condition whitch they were prescribed for.I wish=

his theory maybe true and if a real cure can be found to rid the livving fr=
om negative attachments that can cause and mimick mental illness in normall=
